website_summaries.verdict: A great mid-price serum enriched with ferulic acid and vitamin E and made using kakadu plum extract which contains on average 55x the vitamin C of a Florida orange.
pros: Doesn’t feel sticky like some vitamin C serums
Users reported great success in fading dark spots and wrinkles
A hypoallergenic option that is cruelty-free and dermatologist tested and approved
A portion of the sales of each bottle are also donated to help build aboriginal community enterprises based on the kakadu plum
cons: Isn't as collagen-focused as some other serums

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the cost.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using similar serums for years. This one is expensive and not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: jwgreece

customer_reviews.title: Best Vitamin C serum
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Vitamin C serum I ever tried!
customer_reviews.author: Valentyna

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product! Just thick. Doesn't absorb. Certainly not an oil. Would return but threw away the box
customer_reviews.author: Laura Komisarcik

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I like it so much my skin becomes more soft and lighter
customer_reviews.author: sally s.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it, makes my skin feel so much firmer. Using it together with wrinkle Revenge
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Westberg

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I haven't gotten the results I ecpected yet, but still hopeful.
customer_reviews.author: nitab

customer_reviews.title: love! I have only been using for two weeks ...
customer_reviews.text: love! I have only been using for two weeks and already notice a difference in my skin. My skin feels very soft and smooth. highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: DeeOrd

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: I used this product and was very disappointed, for the price I don't feel it did what it claims to do.
customer_reviews.author: Rocio S.

customer_reviews.title: Love this serum!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this serum! It brightens my complexion and gives it an overall glow.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy K. Trontell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great with the hyaluronic serum. Makes your skin dewy and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive, not working yet.
customer_reviews.text: I broke out wit a red spot on my face. Had to discontinue using it on my face. I do use it on brown spots on my arms. No sign of it minimizing the brown spots yet.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Why Change a Great Thing?
customer_reviews.text: This product used to be awesome until they changed the formula! It's nothing like it use to be and feels like you've poured mineral oil on your face. They've ruined a good thing. Don't waste your money!
customer_reviews.author: RT

customer_reviews.title: Question use of this product.
customer_reviews.text: After one use of 4 drops to a dry face as recommended my face was swollen, burning, red, & itching within 12 hours. The following day blisters appeared. Within 48 hours the blisters crusted and redness better but skin feels like sandpaper. I sent photos to customer asking for advice but never received a response of any kind.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 29.99 @ Costco
customer_reviews.text: Look forward to using this vit c and e serum. Purchased 2 for 29.99 inc shipping from Costco. Gotta love that price.
customer_reviews.author: S. Hall

customer_reviews.title: I've been using this for about 6 months at night ...
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for about 6 months at night. Feeding my skin this has caused a noticeable glow not only to myself, but to others. It improves hyper-pigmentation, skin tone and aided in the suppleness of my skin. A+
customer_reviews.author: CreReigns

customer_reviews.title: Not a good scent
customer_reviews.text: I got a 2 pack from costco, so the price was right. I HATE the smell. It leaves my skin super tacky. So I only use it at night.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but would rather have a natural product like this than a bunch of irritating fragrances
customer_reviews.text: I've only been using this for a week and can already tell a difference in my skin's tone and texture. My skin looks brighter and more hydrated. I'm not a huge fan of the smell, but would rather have a natural product like this than a bunch of irritating fragrances. I'm not sure if it's worth $95, but I'm a fan of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Made me break out
customer_reviews.text: This product broke out my face and neck areas. Red blotches all over. After 3 days of using it, I stopped immediately and I'm still having a hard time reducing the effects it put on my face and neck.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love this serum because it makes my skin look very ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this serum because it makes my skin look very healthy and fresh. It gives me a glow actually!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah erickson

customer_reviews.title: less noticeable fine lines. I would highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I initially bought this product from another store and discovered it by pure accident. What caught my attention was that it has 20% vitamin C and at the time I was in search of a product with vitamin C to add to my skincare regimen. I have been faithfully applying this product to my face, neck, and décolleté area for the past 3 weeks. These are my results: even tone, brighter skin, tighter skin, less noticeable fine lines. I would highly recommend this product. Just add this to your regular skincare regimen.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: The product is amazing! I think sometimes people want instant gratification
customer_reviews.text: The product is amazing! I think sometimes people want instant gratification. I you use on one side of your face or hands and then compare you will see a noted difference. Skin is brighter, lighter and smooths out color and imperfections. Love this!!
customer_reviews.author: Tally

customer_reviews.title: Great product!  Makes my skin look and feel great!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using the Vichy Vitamin C Serum for about 9 months. Didn't see much improvement. This serum is heavier and actually feels like it is nourishing my skin. The only downside for me is that as you are applying it there is a slightly strange odor. It does go away after a few minutes upon drying so not a big thing - I just expected it to not have a smell or smell good.
customer_reviews.author: Katie P Kenney

customer_reviews.title: My daughter gave me a bottle of this and I ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter gave me a bottle of this and I am very impressed. My face is smooth, tighter, lines are much less. I am 63.
customer_reviews.author: T. Martin

product_meta.title: DERMAdoctor Kakadu C 20% Vitamin C Serum with Ferulic Acid & Vitamin E, 1 fl oz
